thread.title: YouTube Gaming for Android Updated with Ability to Stream Mobile Games - newsR
thread.title_full: YouTube Gaming for Android Updated with Ability to Stream Mobile Games - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: YouTube Gaming for Android Updated with Ability to Stream Mobile Games - newsR
text: Google's answer to Twitch is called YouTube Gaming, a service that was officially announced back in June. The streaming service was launched in August, but the application did not allow users to stream mobile games. The good news is with today's update, YouTube Gaming application will allow Android users to stream mobile game from their smartphones and tablets. Although both Android and iOS versions of YouTube Gaming have been updated this week, only the Android applicat... Â»
